short_summary: Renovation of building for Parks Canada in Pond Inlet
description: The Government of Canada requires the Services of a qualified contractor for the Design and Inspection of SNP Office Building Renovation at Pond Inlet, Nunavut
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement: Design and Inspection of SNP Office Building Renovation

## Project Background

Parks Canada Agency invites contractors to submit Proposals (RFP 5P468-23-0045/A) for the Design and Inspection of the SNP Office Building Renovation in Pond Inlet, Nunavut. The project involves renovating the existing office building to add eight office spaces on the lower floor.

## Contract Requirements

*    Contractor shall develop design documents for construction services to complete renovations and repairs.
*    The 8 office spaces will include 6 cubicles and 2 enclosed offices.
*    The Contractor must modify the space to make it more suitable for an office environment.
*    The project's estimated value is between $100,001 and $ 250,000 (Taxes extra).
*    The Contractor shall complete the work no later than July 15, 2024.

## Proposal Requirements

*    Submissions must be made through email to [soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca](mailto:soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca).
*    FACSIMILE UPON REQUEST.
*    Submissions received via SAP ARIBA will not be accepted.
*    The maximum email file size that Parks Canada is capable of receiving is 15 megabytes.
*    The Contractor is responsible for ensuring that the email size as a whole, and not just the attachments, does not exceed the maximum size.

## Site Information

The project will be led by Park Canada Agency and subject to the Comprehensive Land Claims Agreement for Nunavut.


## Selection Criteria

*    The Contractor selected for this project must have experience in similar projects.
*    A “Company profile”with the following information should accompany the Proposal:
    *    Company contact information
    *    Experience in undertaking similar projects
    *    Capability of undertaking the stipulated specifications
    *    Payment terms


## Additional Materials

Bidders are required to obtain the attached documents from the Government of Canada’s Electronic Tendering Service before preparing their proposals.

## Deadlines

The Proposal must be submitted by the deadline indicated in the Bidder's package. Enquiries regarding this solicitation must be received no later than 8 business days prior to the solicitation closing to allow sufficient time to provide a response. Late submissions will not be considered.
